articles.content:
Media captionBrian May on re-making We Are The Champions for the NHS
Brian May has said he is in "relentless pain" following a gardening mishap during lockdown.
"I managed to rip my Gluteus Maximus to shreds in a moment of over-enthusiastic gardening," the … [+1014 chars]

articles.title: Taylor Swift to release an exclusive concert special with behind-the-scenes moments - Daily Mail
articles.description: The singer is set to release an exclusive concert special filmed in Paris last September 2019 on ABC on Sunday.
articles.content:
She pulled the plug on her 2020 tour due to the coronavirus. 
But Taylor Swift is set to release an exclusive concert special, filmed in Paris last September 2019 on ABC on Sunday.
A teaser clip shows the singer, 30, commanding the stage in a perilously sho… [+2941 chars]

articles.title: Kate Garraway pays tribute to husband Derek and NHS staff in poignant' update - Liverpool Echo
articles.description: Kate Garraway said she was going through "terrible times"
articles.content:
Kate Garraway said she was going through "terrible times" as her husband Derek continues to battle coronavirus.
Kate's Good Morning Britain co-stars "sent their love" to her after she issued another update on her husband's condition. 
Kate, 53, said: "Derek… [+2020 chars]

articles.title: Star Wars' John Boyega got trolled by LEGO for hating Porgs - digitalspy.com
articles.description: You reap what you sow, John.
articles.content:
God bless John Boyega. Despite having a central (if not central enough) role in the latest Star Wars trilogy, the Rise of Skywalker star has never held back from saying how he feels.
Whether it's throwing shade on Reylo shippers or sharing his concerns over … [+1612 chars]

articles.title: Rough and Rowdy Ways: Bob Dylan to release first album of original songs in eight years - The Independent
articles.description: The singer also shared new track ‘False Prophet’
articles.content:
Bob Dylan is set to release his first album of original songs in eight years.
The studio album, titled Rough and Rowdy Ways, will be available on 19 June and contains the previously released tracks Murder Most Foul and I Contain Multitudes, the latter of whi… [+968 chars]
